KRIBHCO Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 03 Senior Manager and Chief Manager Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 22, 2025, 10:48 IST
 Krishak Bharati Cooperative Limited
 3 Jobs |  Posted On : 22-Aug-2025 |  Uttar Pradesh |  Salary : 93,000 to 240,000




FOLLOW

The Krishak Bharati Cooperative Limited (KRIBHCO) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 03 Senior Manager, Chief Manager Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./ B. Tech in Electrical, Mechanical Engineering can apply for the KRIBHCO Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Uttar Pradesh.

KRIBHCO Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Senior Manager	01	B.E./B. Tech in Electrical, Mechanical Engineering
Chief Manager	02

KRIBHCO Recruitment 2025 Age Limit: 

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 46 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

KRIBHCO Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

KRIBHCO Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

KRIBHCO Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 93,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 2,40,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the KRIBHCO Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the KRIBHCO Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	21-08-2025
Closing date	21-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
